## What Are These Energy Capsules?
Capsules containing microdosed, pharmaceutically purified shilajit resin standardized for fulvic acid content. Formulated to support stamina and mineral replenishment.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Shilajit is considered a potent Rasayana in Ayurveda, used for restoring strength, improving resilience, and supporting metabolic vitality—only when purified and sourced responsibly.

### Key Benefits (Supportive)
- Helps support natural energy levels.
- Provides trace minerals and fulvic compounds.
- Supports physical resilience.

## Ingredients
- Purified, standardized shilajit resin (microdose)

## Usage Instructions
- Follow label dosage strictly. Best taken under practitioner supervision.

## Packaging
- Small amber jar with batch purity certificate.

## Safety & Consultation
- Not for those pregnant, breastfeeding, with kidney issues, gout, or heavy-metal sensitivity. Only use purified forms. Consult doctor if on medication.

## Why Choose This Standardized Capsule?
Guaranteed purity, safe microdosing, clinical-style transparency, and practitioner-friendly guidance.
